benchmark_details.name: EthioMT: Parallel Corpus for Low-resource Ethiopian Languages
benchmark_details.overview: EthioMT is a new parallel corpus for 15 Ethiopian languages paired with English and introduces a benchmark dataset for enhancing research in low-resource Ethiopian languages.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To foster research and development in low-resource Ethiopian languages through the introduction of a parallel corpus and benchmark dataset.

data.source: Collected datasets from religious domains and public repositories.
data.size: Dataset sizes vary for each language based on multiple sources.
data.annotation: Automated alignment of sentences between Ethiopian languages and English.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on translation accuracy in bidirectional tasks.
methodology.interpretation: A higher BLEU score indicates better translation quality.
methodology.baseline_results: Baseline translation results show improved performance for languages with larger dataset sizes.
methodology.validation: Evaluated using established translation models and metrics.
